title: The Missing Influencer
description: Riley Chen (@RileysRealLife, 52K followers) disappeared after posting about visiting Moonbeam Café, but the café staff confirm they never showed up. Last seen 3 days ago.

initial_investigation.title: Initial Investigation
initial_investigation.description: It's 4:30 PM. You have until 6:00 PM before some locations close and people become unavailable.

follow_up.title: Follow-up Investigation
follow_up.description: It's 6:00 PM. Some new options are available, but time is running out.

visit_cafe.title: Visit Moonbeam Café
visit_cafe.description: Talk to the staff about Riley's supposed visit.

analyze_social_media.title: Analyze Riley's Social Media
analyze_social_media.description: Look for patterns in Riley's recent posts and follower interactions.

interview_alex.title: Interview Alex Chen
interview_alex.description: Talk to Riley's sibling about recent events.

contact_taylor.title: Contact Taylor (@TaylorMadeContent)
contact_taylor.description: Reach out to Riley's fellow influencer friend.

search_apartment.title: Search Riley's Apartment
search_apartment.description: Look for clues in Riley's living space.

cafe_discrepancy.title: Café Security 'Malfunction'
cafe_discrepancy.description: The barista Sam reveals that Riley seemed stressed during their last actual visit a week ago, and the security cameras mysteriously 'malfunctioned' on the day Riley claimed to visit.

cafe_basic_info.title: Café Staff Confusion
cafe_basic_info.description: The staff confirm Riley didn't visit on the day they posted about it, but you don't learn much more.

posting_pattern_change.title: Suspicious Posting Pattern
posting_pattern_change.description: Riley's recent posts show a dramatic shift in tone and timing. Followers are commenting about how 'different' Riley seems lately.

surface_social_media.title: Basic Social Media Info
surface_social_media.description: Riley's posts seem normal on the surface, though the last post about the café was 3 days ago.

alex_background_info.title: Family Concerns
alex_background_info.description: Alex reveals that Riley has been stressed about money and their new manager Marcus Webb. Riley mentioned feeling 'trapped' in recent conversations.

marcus_warning_signs.title: Marcus Webb's Troubling History
marcus_warning_signs.description: Online searches reveal complaints from other influencers about Marcus's aggressive tactics and questionable contracts.

marcus_basic_info.title: Marcus Webb Basic Info
marcus_basic_info.description: Marcus Webb is Riley's manager. He seems to have a legitimate business, but you can't find much detail.

taylor_insider_info.title: Industry Warning
taylor_insider_info.description: Taylor warns that Marcus has a reputation for isolating his clients and pushing them into uncomfortable situations for content.

taylor_surface_info.title: Fellow Influencer Concern
taylor_surface_info.description: Taylor confirms they haven't heard from Riley in several days, which is unusual.

apartment_evidence.title: Packed Suitcase and Plane Ticket
apartment_evidence.description: You find a packed suitcase hidden under Riley's bed and a plane ticket to Portland for tomorrow, along with a note saying 'Had to get away from M. Will explain later.'

apartment_basic.title: Tidy Apartment
apartment_basic.description: Riley's apartment appears normal and tidy, though some personal items seem to be missing.
